definitions: the condition or period of an animal or plant spending the winter in a dormant state

examples.text: grizzly bears gorge on seeds to prepare for hibernation
honeybees are waking from their winter hibernation

shortDefinitions: condition or period of animal or plant spending winter in dormant state

definitions: an extended period of remaining inactive or indoors

examples.text: the fair-weather cyclists are emerging from winter hibernation
we shut down, went into hibernation for a week

shortDefinitions: extended period of remaining inactive or indoors
